description: Initial baseline measurement with working test framework
notes: Baseline with working test framework. Two variant metrics: coverage (what's in downloaded papers) vs extraction (what's actually found).
bottlenecks: BOTTLENECK 1: 117 PMIDs missing (44.7% of gold standard) - blocks all metrics
BOTTLENECK 2: Extraction quality 17.1% - only finding ~half of possible variants
BOTTLENECK 3: 661 carriers (39.8%) have no PMID - theoretical max ~60%
BOTTLENECK 4: 0% supplement coverage - many variants in supps
